definitions: a person or thing that makes something possible

examples.text: the people who run these workshops are crime enablers
Bluetooth is the ultimate enabler of the smart house that has been the darling of futurists since the 1939 World's Fair

shortDefinitions: person or thing that makes something possible

definitions: a person who encourages or enables negative or self-destructive behavior in another

examples.text: being an enabler to an addict does more harm than good

shortDefinitions: person who encourages or enables negative or self-destructive behaviour in another
